type.name: Hook
type.par1: parametr1 - sharpness. Affects of successful sweeps and chance to failure
type.par2: parametr2 - hook size. Affects chance to nibble and chance to breakdown

type.name: bait
type.par1: parametr1 - attractiveness from 50 to 200. Normal 100 (affects the fish nibble)

type.name: imitation bait
type.par1: parametr1 - attractiveness from 50 to 200. Normal 100(affects the fish nibble)
type.par2: parametr2 - bio ID of immitation bait

type.name: Fish tank
type.par1: parametr1 - which can withstand weight of fish
type.par2: parametr2 - which can withstand amount of fish

type.name: Repair kit
type.par2: Loss of base durability when fixing
